title: Firefox theme changing
content: I am attempting to find a "theme" that is clear and easily read. I'm unable to find one that I really like, but have found one that will do. But, every time the program starts, the theme reverts back to something called "system theme" which is not easily legible at all. What is the problem here? What is the solution? Thanks
creator: airwilly

title: Suddenly an AD-BLOCKER prevents me playing video on SBSOnDemand
content: Tell me how do i find and then remove the AD-BLOCKER that is preventing me watching videos?

title: recover tabs
content: I accidentally closed FF with over 200 tabs open all of which are connected to some research. Is there any way I can recover the open tabs?

title: Auto reload every few seconds, even with auttorefresh block true on About:Config page.
